channel.title: Web Development on Christian Stjernberg
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Christian Stjernberg

item.title: Portfolio Site
item.description: This project is a complete overhaul of my old site using ClojureScript. Leveraging Reagent and Tailwind for layout and styling, and tools like Leiningen and Figwheel for development, I gave the site a fresh new look. It’s now more flexible and easier to expand.
